Landing.heroSubtitle: Real-time financial consolidation. We spot cost anomalies before they blow your end-of-month budget.
Landing.featuresSubtitle: BurnWatch was built to cut through the noise and focus on what matters for your financial health.
Landing.feature1Desc: No SDKs or heavy agents. Connect your accounts in seconds via read-only API keys and see your financial history without installing anything.
Landing.feature2Desc: Regression algorithms analyze your daily consumption and project exact end-of-month cost before the invoice hits your inbox.
Landing.feature3Desc: No unnecessary noise. Our anomaly system only fires when consumption deviation goes completely off the rails for your project.
Landing.securitySubtitle: Your infrastructure credentials are encrypted before storage. We use strict data isolation so only your organization can access financial data.
Landing.securityEncryptionDesc: Keys protected at rest with layers of isolation.
Landing.securityRlsDesc: Data protected natively at the database level.
Landing.securityReadOnlyDesc: We only use read-only billing permissions.
Landing.alertsSubtitle: You don't need to open the panel to know if spend spiked. We notify your team where they already are.
Landing.alertsSlackDesc: Real-time notifications straight to your team's infrastructure channel.
Landing.alertsDiscordDesc: Track burn rate in your community or side-project workspace.
Landing.alertsEmailDesc: Weekly digests and critical alerts sent to organization admins.
Landing.step1Desc: Add Vercel, AWS or GCP API keys in a secure 30-second process.
Landing.step2Desc: The sync engine processes spend, normalizes data and applies burn rate logic.
Landing.step3Desc: See your multi-cloud billing at a glance and get proactive alerts.
Landing.orgSupportDesc: Member management with RBAC (Owner, Admin, Member).
Landing.collabSubtitle: Share cost metrics with the whole team without compromising security. Control permissions and centralize your startup's financial governance.
Landing.pricingSubtitle: Pick the plan that fits your current burn rate. Stop cloud waste and get the financial visibility your startup needs to scale with confidence.
Landing.pricingDisclaimer: * Billing in USD. Floating exchange rate applied for display.
